In a world thatâ€™s constantly evolving, our Groupâ€™s future depends on how well our people can learn, adapt, and lead with purpose. This programme is designed to build the key behaviours that drive performance and growth:
- Innovation
- Strategic Thinking
- Collaboration
- Communication
- Resilience
- Inclusivity

By strengthening these capabilities, we help individuals think critically, act with confidence, and contribute meaningfully to their teams and the Groupâ€™s success. More than just personal development, this is about creating a workplace culture rooted in trust, engagement, and continuous improvement â€” one thatâ€™s ready to grow, evolve, and exceed expectations.

WOMEN IN LEADERSHIP GRADUATES


We are proud to mark the successful completion of the Women in Leadership programme, where participants embarked on a powerful journey of self-discovery, team leadership, and business impact. Through experiential learning and personal reflection, these inspiring women built their leadership brands and strengthened their ability to lead with empathy, purpose, and influence. Congratulations to all our participants â€” hereâ€™s to shaping a more inclusive future!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/518a8416-d45a-3d30-5af7-a22eebe6b4d2.jpg> 	
	

FACES BRAND TRAINERSâ€™ WORKSHOP


FACES Brand Trainers joined an inspiring workshop designed to boost self-awareness, enrich team dynamics, and elevate their impact. The session sparked fresh ideas and reinforced their role as outstanding ambassadors for learning.

FACES Brand Trainers joined an inspiring workshop designed to boost self-awareness, enrich team dynamics, and elevate their impact. The session sparked fresh ideas and reinforced their role as outstanding ambassadors for learning.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/f7911b1b-ab99-501a-f680-621cfb6b0a98.jpg> 	
	

STORE LEADERSHIP DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME


We are excited to mark the successful launch of the Store Leadership Development Programme across all regions, including the Etoile Group. This 120-day journey is designed for R4 and R5 leaders, blending in-class sessions, virtual learning, in-store projects, and coaching to elevate their leadership capabilities. The programme aims to empower store leaders to drive performance, inspire teams, and enhance the customer experience across our retail network.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/images/1fd9fc96-3d48-e9e6-902f-f72772f2e848.jpg> 	
 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/4fb8567b-b8cd-2d73-ed55-12fc19f3a220.jpg> 	
	

INVESTMENT TEAM WORKSHOP


The Investment Team gathered for an engaging workshop on strengthening communication, improving collaboration, and adapting personal styles to different contexts. Together, they explored fresh perspectives to enhance team effectiveness.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/97660831-fbad-4593-0ad6-542277308405.jpg> 	
	

PEOPLE & CULTURE TEAM BUILDING

The Investment Team gathered for an engaging workshop on strengthening communication, improving collaboration, and adapting personal styles to different contexts. Together, they explored fresh perspectives to enhance team effectiveness.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/97660831-fbad-4593-0ad6-542277308405.jpg> 	
	

PEOPLE & CULTURE TEAM BUILDING


A day filled with energy, connection, and creativity as the People & Culture team came together for a vibrant team-building experience. From the powerful Human Constellations activity to surprise musical performances and a lively silent disco, the day was a celebration of unity, talent, and team spirit. While the agenda was packed, the true highlight was the shared moments, laughter, and harmony we created together.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/bba8d2e9-7804-c022-92e4-14a423c494c2.jpg> 	
	

TALENT ACQUISITION AWAY DAY


The Talent Acquisition Away Day brought our community together for an inspiring day of connection and collaboration. The agenda was packed with impactful keynotes, a thought-provoking panel discussion featuring Wassim Eid and Samer Touma, and uplifting success stories from the Nationalization team. We wrapped up the day by celebrating the outstanding contributions of our Talent Acquisition team, recognising their achievements with well-deserved awards.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/4cddd719-e9be-be31-08e0-66c84250d5ac.jpg> 	
	

RAMADAN LIGHTS OFFSITE

The Talent Acquisition Away Day brought our community together for an inspiring day of connection and collaboration. The agenda was packed with impactful keynotes, a thought-provoking panel discussion featuring Wassim Eid and Samer Touma, and uplifting success stories from the Nationalization team. We wrapped up the day by celebrating the outstanding contributions of our Talent Acquisition team, recognising their achievements with well-deserved awards.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/4cddd719-e9be-be31-08e0-66c84250d5ac.jpg> 	
	

RAMADAN LIGHTS OFFSITE


The Warehouse Team recently came together for the Ramadan Lights offsite an energising session dedicated to fostering team connection and recognising performance. The day began with a clear acknowledgment of key achievements, followed by interactive activities designed to strengthen collaboration and engagement. The offsite successfully reinforced a culture of high performance and teamwork in a purposeful and impactful way.

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/768e1da7-1ec6-43b3-0a75-4458de99a064.jpg> 	
	

LEARNING JOURNEY FOR THE ACCOUNTING TEAM IN JORDAN


Our Jordan Accounting Team embarked on a hands-on learning journey, deepening their expertise in designing impactful business presentations and customer-centered finance practices. A big thank you to all participants for their energy and commitment!

 <https://mcusercontent.com/101e49fb58ec7b23a147c194a/_compresseds/941dfa10-cffb-bf52-485d-0f43ba05b6a8.jpg> 	
	

LEARNING PATHWAYS | TOP LEARNERS Q1 2025
